message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $150 for it. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you have any suggestions for a different price.

Thank you for offering the premium product. I appreciate the effort and design behind it. However, based on my research and budget, I am looking to spend no more than $100 on this product. Would it be possible for us to negotiate a price closer to that amount?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. While I would like to accommodate your request, the cost of production and the value we place on this product make it challenging to reduce the price further. I propose a counteroffer of $120 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our costs and your budget considerations. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. After considering your proposal, I believe $110 would be a fair compromise. This price still allows me to stay within my budget while acknowledging the value of your product.
